meanings.definition: A natural organic compound found in shark liver oil and human sebum.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the squalene in shark liver oil.
meanings.sent2: Her skin produces squalene to keep it moisturized.
meanings.sent3: The squalene in the oil made the fish slippery to catch.
meanings.sent4: The squalene acted like a shield, protecting the skin from harm.
meanings.sent5: The smell of squalene filled the room, reminding her of the ocean.

meanings.definition: A precursor to steroids in the human body.
meanings.sent1: Athletes should not take squalene as it can lead to banned substances.
meanings.sent2: The body uses squalene to make important hormones.
meanings.sent3: The squalene in his diet made him feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like squalene, fueling her strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how squalene transforms into powerful steroids in the body.
